means: 乱骂，咒骂( cuss的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The coach cussed out the team for losing the game.
sentence.Network_cn: 教练由于队员输了把他们痛斥了一顿.

sentence.Network_en: She's so cussed she always does the opposite of what you ask.
sentence.Network_cn: 她这人真是牛脾气,总是与你的要求背道而驰.

sentence.Network_en: No, Tom, I won't be rich, and I won't live in them cussed smothery houses.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不干, 汤姆, 我不要当富人, 也不想住在那闷热倒霉的房子里.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇新译 C_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... cuss 诅咒 cussed 该诅咒的 cusso 苦苏花.
adamant固执的;坚强的,坚定不移的cussed固执的;乖僻的;坏脾气的mulish似骡的;顽固的,执拗的

list.abs: cuss , abuse 骂人 cut the crap 别废话 beat the *** out of you 把你的屎打出来 bull***. 胡说 sit back 别管闲事儿 feel *** about oneself 感觉.

词汇竞赛 - 中国习网 ... Discuss 讨论 Cuss 咒骂 UnLucky 不幸的.
stupid 笨蛋a stream of cuss 一顿骂a stream of abuse 一顿骂

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent. (originally US): variant of cursed

entry.def: If someone cusses, they swear at someone or use bad language.

example.ex: Tosh was known to be a man who would cuss and shout...
example.tran: 托什是一个遇事喜欢又嚷又骂的人。

example.ex: He rails and cusses at those pop stars.
example.tran: 他辱骂并诅咒那些流行音乐歌手。

auth_sentence.content: It takes unusual cussedness to resist the music industry's conservatism, and Tucker Martine plain doesn't sound cussed.
auth_sentence.res_content: It takes unusual cussedness to resist the music industry's conservatism, and Tucker Martine plain doesn't sound cussed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It takes unusual cussedness to resist the music industry's conservatism, and Tucker Martine plain doesn't sound cussed.

auth_sentence.content: Watson, too, was a shadow of the cussed competitor who usually makes an opponent work so hard to win every point.
auth_sentence.res_content: Watson, too, was a shadow of the cussed competitor who usually makes an opponent work so hard to win every point.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Watson, too, was a shadow of the cussed competitor who usually makes an opponent work so hard to win every point.

auth_sentence.content: One recall volunteer was booed and cussed for collecting signatures at a high-school football game.
auth_sentence.res_content: One recall volunteer was booed and cussed for collecting signatures at a high-school football game.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One recall volunteer was booed and cussed for collecting signatures at a high-school football game.
